M=${TM_LATEX_MASTER:=$TM_FILEPATH} DIR=`dirname "$M"` FILE=`basename "$M"` export TM_LATEX_DOCBASE=${TM_LATEX_DOCBASE:="/usr/local/teTeX/share/texmf.tetex/"} export TM_LATEX_HELP_CATALOG=${TM_LATEX_HELP_CATALOG:="/usr/local/teTeX/share/texmf.tetex/doc/help/Catalogue/entries/"}
# Switch to the right directory. cd "$TM_PROJECT_DIRECTORY" cd "$DIR"
PyTeXdoc.py
